name: CataFishmic!
description:
My first close to a game, game in GameMaker Studio 2 (that's a lot of games.). While the end result is ultimately simple I learned quite a lot behind the scenes.
It's also super pretty. I'm proud. Never thought I would find myself kinda liking coding.

(P.S. Upon testing my upload I have learned a very valuable lesson about making really dumb-ish non-standard screen sizes.)
